meanings.sent1: The indefatigable worker never seemed to run out of energy.
meanings.sent2: She showed an indefatigable spirit in completing her tasks.
meanings.sent3: The indefatigable squirrel kept running on the wheel for hours.
meanings.sent4: His indefatigable dedication to his craft was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The indefatigable sun rose every morning without fail.

meanings.sent1: Despite the long journey, his indefatigable pace never wavered.
meanings.sent2: The indefatigable efforts of the team led to their success.
meanings.sent3: The indefatigable puppy chased its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: Her indefatigable optimism brightened everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The indefatigable river flowed steadily through the valley.

meanings.sent1: The indefatigable athlete trained rigorously every day.
meanings.sent2: His indefatigable determination helped him overcome obstacles.
meanings.sent3: The indefatigable clock ticked away without a break.
meanings.sent4: Their indefatigable teamwork led to remarkable achievements.
meanings.sent5: The indefatigable wind blew through the trees, never stopping.
